mapper.insert: insert into partners (partner_id, parent_partner_id, platform_id, `path`, `name`, trade_ratio, shop_authority, audit_authority, created, updated, is_deleted) values (#{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentPartnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeRatio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopAuthority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{auditAuthority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update partners set parent_partner_id = #{parentPartnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `path` = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_ratio = #{tradeRatio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_authority = #{shopAuthority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, audit_authority = #{auditAuthority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select partner_id, parent_partner_id, platform_id, `path`, `name`, trade_ratio, shop_authority, audit_authority, created, updated, is_deleted from partners where partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
